```{r}
surgery = pat_operes %>% select(patid,evtid,dateacte) %>% 
    distinct() %>% 
    rename(date_surgery = dateacte) %>% 
    group_by(patid,evtid) %>% 
    summarise(date_surgery = min(date_surgery), .groups = "keep")


full_join(surgery,reprise) %>% mutate(diff = datent - date(date_surgery)) %>% arrange(diff)

```
